In environment T : UniformSpace x : T P : T -> Prop H : exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y The term "x" has type "let (sort, _, _) := T in sort" while it is expected to have type "R".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: UniformSpace

Goal:
forall (x : T) (P : T -> Prop), locally x P -> locally x (fun y : T => locally y P)

Premises:
locally = fun (x : T) (P : T -> Prop) => exists eps : posreal, forall y : T, ball x eps y -> P y : T -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
Build_Filter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun _ : T => True) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x)) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q) -> Filter F
fct_ball_sym : forall (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) (x y : T -> U) (e : R), fct_ball T U x e y -> fct_ball T U y e x
fct_ball_triangle : forall (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) (x y z : T -> U) (e1 e2 : R), fct_ball T U x e1 y -> fct_ball T U y e2 z -> fct_ball T U x (e1 + e2) z
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zred_factor5 : forall (x y : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P y -> P (x * 0 + y)%Z
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zplus_comm : forall (x y : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (y + x)%Z -> P (x + y)%Z
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zred_factor0 : forall (x : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (x * 1)%Z -> P x
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zred_factor6 : forall (x : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (x + 0)%Z -> P x
Build_ProperFilter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), (forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x) -> Filter F -> ProperFilter F
fct_ball_center : forall (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) (x : T -> U) (e : posreal), fct_ball T U x e x
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zopp_eq_mult_neg_1 : forall (x : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (x * -1)%Z -> P (- x)%Z
UniformSpace.Mixin : forall (M : Type) (ball : M -> R -> M -> Prop), (forall (x : M) (e : posreal), ball x e x) -> (forall (x y : M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x) -> (forall (x y z : M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z) -> UniformSpace.mixin_of M
exist : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A), P x -> {x : A | P x}
existT : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Type) (x : A), P x -> {x : A & P x}
Record ProperFilter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_ProperFilter { filter_ex : forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x; filter_filter : Filter F } For ProperFilter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For ProperFilter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_ProperFilter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope _]
ball_le : forall (x : ?M) (e1 e2 : R), e1 <= e2 -> forall y : ?M, ball x e1 y -> ball x e2 y where ?M : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
IVT_cor : forall (f : R -> R) (x y : R), continuity f -> x <= y -> f x * f y <= 0 -> {z : R | x <= z <= y /\ f z = 0}
IVT : forall (f : R -> R) (x y : R), continuity f -> x < y -> f x < 0 -> 0 < f y -> {z : R | x <= z <= y /\ f z = 0}
ball_sym : forall (x y : ?M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x where ?M : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
Record mixin_of (M : Type) : Type := Mixin { ball : M -> R -> M -> Prop; ax1 : forall (x : M) (e : posreal), ball x e x; ax2 : forall (x y : M) (e : R), ball x e y -> ball y e x; ax3 : forall (x y z : M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z } For mixin_of: Argument scope is [type_scope] For Mixin: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
sigT_of_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> {x : A & P x}
proj1_sig : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), {x : A | P x} -> A
QArith_base.Qlt_not_eq : forall x y : QArith_base.Q, QArith_base.Qlt x y -> ~ QArith_base.Qeq x y
UniformSpace.ax2 : forall (M : Type) (m : UniformSpace.mixin_of M) (x y : M) (e : R), UniformSpace.ball M m x e y -> UniformSpace.ball M m y e x
ball_triangle : forall (x y z : ?M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z where ?M : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
close_trans : forall x y z : ?M, close x y -> close y z -> close x z where ?M : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
Radd_comm : forall (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop), ring_theory rO rI radd rmul rsub ropp req -> forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x)
close_sym : forall x y : ?M, close x y -> close y x where ?M : [T : UniformSpace |- UniformSpace]
close = fun (M : UniformSpace) (x y : M) => forall eps : posreal, ball x eps y : forall M : UniformSpace, M -> M -> Prop Argument M is implicit and maximally inserted
UniformSpace.ax3 : forall (M : Type) (m : UniformSpace.mixin_of M) (x y z : M) (e1 e2 : R), UniformSpace.ball M m x e1 y -> UniformSpace.ball M m y e2 z -> UniformSpace.ball M m x (e1 + e2) z
OmegaLemmas.OMEGA6 : forall x y z : Z, (0 <= x)%Z -> y = 0%Z -> (0 <= x + y * z)%Z
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Record ring_theory (R : Type) (rO rI : R) (radd rmul rsub : R -> R -> R) (ropp : R -> R) (req : R -> R -> Prop) : Prop := mk_rt { Radd_0_l : forall x : R, req (radd rO x) x; Radd_comm : forall x y : R, req (radd x y) (radd y x); Radd_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (radd x (radd y z)) (radd (radd x y) z); Rmul_1_l : forall x : R, req (rmul rI x) x; Rmul_comm : forall x y : R, req (rmul x y) (rmul y x); Rmul_assoc : forall x y z : R, req (rmul x (rmul y z)) (rmul (rmul x y) z); Rdistr_l : forall x y z : R, req (rmul (radd x y) z) (radd (rmul x z) (rmul y z));...
Rmin_r : forall x y : R, Rmin x y <= y
Pos.le = fun x y : positive => (x ?= y)%positive <> Gt : positive -> positive -> Prop Argument scopes are [positive_scope positive_scope]
Z.le = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z <> Gt : Z -> Z -> Prop Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
Pos.lt = fun x y : positive => (x ?= y)%positive = Lt : positive -> positive -> Prop Argument scopes are [positive_scope positive_scope]
Z.lt = fun x y : Z => (x ?= y)%Z = Lt : Z -> Z -> Prop Argument scopes are [Z_scope Z_scope]
N.lt = fun x y : N => (x ?= y)%N = Lt : N -> N -> Prop Argument scopes are [N_scope N_scope]
Rmin_l : forall x y : R, Rmin x y <= x

```coq
intros T x P Hloc y.
unfold locally in *. 
intros (eps & Heps).
exists eps.
intros z Hz.
apply Hloc.
exists eps.
intros w Hw.
apply Heps.
apply ball_le with x; auto.
Qed.```

original: intros T x P Hloc y. unfold locally in *. intros (eps & Heps). exists eps. intros z Hz. apply Hloc. exists eps. intros w Hw. apply Heps. apply ball_le with x; auto.
